summary: The 'Protecting Circuit Boards and Substrates Act' aims to boost domestic production of printed circuit boards and integrated circuit substrates. It introduces a tax credit for purchasing US-manufactured boards and establishes a financial assistance program to incentivize investment in related manufacturing and R&D. The bill defines terms, outlines program procedures, emphasizes workforce development and national security considerations, and includes clawback provisions. It authorizes $3 billion in appropriations through 2065 and mandates GAO reviews.
